subject: [Radiance-general] photo sensor , electrical ligh
body:
Hi Shalian,

Absolutely, you can do that kind of analysis. I encourage you to check out DAYSIM, SPOT, and DIVA for Rhino, as well as the man page for the Radiance program 'rsensor'. I'm stealing a few minutes here while on vacation, so my reply will necessarily be this breif. BUt some Googling on the programs above should get you started!

Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov

________________________________________
Sent: Wednesday, December 26, 2012 9:23 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
hi everybody
i have a question about electric light analysis in radiance. is it possible to use dimmers or photosensors in this kind of analysis? what are the parameters we you should use for this purpose. thank you in advance
Sincerely
